Html:
Does this version of Storm work with WS HTTP Bindings?

When I try to add my Web Service I get the following output:

Acquiring the wsdl...Resolving the wsdlendpoint...Generating code...Code generation failed.Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FailureException: Assembly not yet created.   at Storm.Types.WebSvcManagerOps.clo@90.CreateWebServiceModel()   at <StartupCode$Storm>.$Type.bgworker.run@51@57_2.Invoke(DoWorkEventArgs dArgs)   at <StartupCode$Storm>.$Type.bgworker.run@51@57_1.Invoke(Object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)   at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.WorkerThreadStart(Object argument)

 

The same Web Service is callable using WCF Storm. There isn't anything WCF specific in the WS HTTP Binding, but maybe this version is Basic HTTP only.
